channel.title: Blogs | robiulislam.me
channel.description: Hey! I am RDS (Rudro Dip Sarker), and its my personal blog where I share my learnings, experiences, and thoughts on different topics. I mostly talk about tech, but I don't have any specific niche. I write about whatever I find interesting. I hope you will find my blogs helpful. Happy reading!

item.description: A journey of me modding the buildspace os chrome extension to customize the look

item.title: On scroll video playback effect
item.description: Let's create an on scroll video playback effect using ffmpeg, framer-motion & nextjs
